thread.title: Dunkin’ Donuts to Drop About 10% of Menu in Move to Streamline Service

author: wsjcom
title: Dunkin’ Donuts to Drop About 10% of Menu in Move to Streamline Service
text:
CANTON, Mass.—Dunkin’ Donuts is cutting back on its food and drink offerings by about 10% nationwide in mid-March.
The Dunkin Brands Group Inc. unit is expected to roll out a new, simplified menu in its New England locations starting Monday, the Boston Herald reported.
The Canton, Mass., company, founded in 1950, said the reduction is meant... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
